sentences.en: A shrewd reply that tells us exactly nothing.
sentences.cn: 回答的话真巧妙,使人坠入五里雾中.

sentences.en: Capra looked at her with shrewd eyes.
sentences.cn: 卡普拉眼神犀利地看着她。

sentences.en: He was shrewd in his personal assessments.
sentences.cn: 他总能对人作出精明的评价.

sentences.en: He was tall and heavy and shrewd and cold.
sentences.cn: 他的身材高大、结实,头脑精明、冷静.

sentences.en: He's too shrewd to be trusted in business matters.
sentences.cn: 他太狡猾,生意上不宜信任.

sentences.en: His answer to the journalist is a shrewd one.
sentences.cn: 他回答记者的问题是很机敏的.

sentences.en: His grey eyes were shrewd but kindly.
sentences.cn: 他灰色的眼睛目光锐利却很亲切。

sentences.en: I have a shrewd guess that John - a - Fenne is on the island.
sentences.cn: 我有一种敏锐的预感,觉得沼泽英雄约翰还会在岛上呢.

sentences.en: It should prove a shrewd investment.
sentences.cn: 这将是一项精明的投资。
马尔科姆是个精明的商人。

sentences.en: My mother had consequently made her own shrewd deductions about what was going on in my marriage.
sentences.cn: 我母亲已据此对我的婚姻状况作出了她自己精明的推断。

sentences.en: She is a shrewd judge of character.
She was shrewd enough to guess who was responsible.
sentences.cn: 她很精明，一猜就知道是谁干的。

sentences.en: The anti - Roosevelt managers maneuvered desperately, but Farley played a shrewd game.
sentences.cn: 反 罗斯福的一些竞争经纪人拼命玩花招, 法利则施展了一种巧计.

sentences.en: The mathematician , Yurchenko , was a stubby , phlegmatic , shrewd person.
sentences.cn: 数学教师 尤尔钦科 是个矮胖的, 冷漠而机灵的人.

sentences.en: Though still in his teens, Tom is shrewd at a bargain.
sentences.cn: 虽然汤姆才十多岁,可是讨价还价却很在行.

sentences.en: Where are you, Little Crabby , you shrewd little thing?
sentences.cn: 哪儿去了? 我的小蟹!

words.tran_cn: 精明干练地；机灵地；刁钻地

trans.tran_cn: 精明的，敏锐的，奸诈的，狡猾的，有眼光的，精于盘算的
trans.tran_en: good at judging what people or situations are really like
